awe6.interfaces.ITextStyle

type
interface
The ITextStyle interface should be implemented by objects created by the createTextStyle method of IFactory.

Instance Variables

align : ETextAlign

Font horizontal alignment.

color : Int

Font color.

filters : Array<Dynamic>

Collection of visual filters appled to font.

font : String

Font name.

isBold : Bool

Font weight.

isItalic : Bool

Font emphasis.

size : Float

Font size.

spacing : Float

Font spacing.

thickness : Float

Font thickness. Range: 0...1.

Instance Methods

toString( ) : String

returns
Representation of this object.
String representation of this object.
